sentences.en: A third and increasingly common method, called biometrics, is based on who and what they do.
sentences.cn: 第三种,也是越来越常见的方法叫做生物统计学, 它是基于用户是谁、他们做什么来证实身份的.

sentences.en: BE also includes cancelable biometrics, and with that, security and privacy can be achieved.
sentences.cn: BE包含了可撤销生物认证技术, 增强了生物认证中的安全性和保护隐私.

sentences.en: Biometrics promises identities that are virtually impossible to steal, impersonate or misplace.
sentences.cn: 这种生物科技测量标准的特徵是近几乎不可能被偷取, 假扮,或误置.

sentences.en: Biometrics raise thorny questions about privacy and the potential for abuse.
sentences.cn: 生物测验学会引发一些有关隐私的棘手问题,同时它还有被滥用的可能.

sentences.en: Can biometrics make banking more secure?
sentences.cn: 生物识别技术能让银行业务更安全 吗 ?

sentences.en: Compared with the traditional verification technology, the biometrics verification has universality, stability and uniqueness.
sentences.cn: 与传统的身份识别技术相比, 生物特征自身具有广泛性 、 稳定性和唯一性.

sentences.en: On - line handwritten signature verification is one of the important technologies in human biometrics authentication fields.
sentences.cn: 手写签名鉴别属于人体生物特徵鉴别领域的重要技术之一.

sentences.en: The fusion of these two biometrics has an advantage in improving verification performance.
sentences.cn: 二者的融合可以有效的改进识别的性能.

words.tran_cn: （单位面积或体积内的）[生态] 生物量
[生态] 生物群系；[生态] 生物群落区
寿命测定（等于biometrics）；生物统计学
[生物]生物统计学；生物测定学；寿命统计

trans.tran_en: the analysis of biological data using mathematical and statistical methods
